comments.body: Quote from: icodewp96 on June 13, 2022, 02:13:18 AMHow can I do it safely and low risk?I don't think getting yourself into trading is a good idea. comments.author: Davidvictorson
comments.body: Quote from: icodewp96 on June 13, 2022, 02:13:18 AMHi dear I want to ask to you about crypto trading, what do you recommend if I have 1000 USD and want to grow it by crypto. How can I do it safely and low risk?Good question. I'd make two(2) assumptions from your question:1) You already have 1000USD which is the money you can afford to lose.2) You are new to crypto tradingThe first step to trade crypto safely is for you to create a crypto trading strategy because crypto trading is already high risk. You need an in-depth knowledge of technical analysis, chain analysis, knowing when to enter a trade and when to exit a trade. There are more traders who lose money than those who don't. It is recommended that you diversify your assets after you have done you research(not binge watching YouTube videos). Avoid trading bot.  Here are some curated topics by users of this forum on crypto trading. https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5364418.0#post_point154Goodluck.

comments.author: Lucius
comments.body: Quote from: icodewp96 on June 13, 2022, 02:13:18 AMHi dear I want to ask to you about crypto trading, what do you recommend if I have 1000 USD and want to grow it by crypto. How can I do it safely and low risk?If you do not need that money and you can afford to invest it for at least a period of 2-3 years, then it would only be logical to invest in Bitcoin. However, before any investment, try to learn some basics in terms of understanding what is a public address and what is a private key, how transactions work, and perhaps most importantly how to properly store your digital assets.The easiest thing to do is to invest, everything is much harder afterwards and there is a greater chance that you will lose your money due to ignorance than due to the volatility of the crypto market.

comments.author: FatFork
comments.body: Quote from: icodewp96 on June 13, 2022, 02:13:18 AMHow can I do it safely and low risk?Since cryptocurrencies are considered a high-risk investment, such a fund or investment vehicle could pose significant risks for investors. Before you decide on this type of investment, make sure you understand the full risks and volatility involved. If you are looking for security, I suggest you shift your attention to another investment market instead. On the other hand, if you are looking for exciting investment returns and high potential of capital appreciation, cryptocurrency is worth considering. You can start with a small investment or use the DCA method while familiarizing yourself with the market. If you have specific questions, do not hesitate to ask.
